toggles.name: cl_hud_color
toggles.description:
Press this key to alternate the HUD color
0:Team Color
1:Teammate Color
2:White
3:Bright White
4:Light Blue
5:Blue
6:Purple
7:Red
8:Orange
9:Yellow
10:Green
11:Aqua
12:Pink

toggles.name: cl_radar_scale
toggles.description: It's the same as toggleradarscale but you could add more values

toggles.name: cl_crosshaircolor
toggles.description:
Press this key to alternate the crosshair color
0:Red
1:Green
2:Yellow
3:Blue
4:Cyan
5:Custom RGB color from the crosshair_[r/g/b] command

toggles.name: cl_crosshairsize
toggles.description: Press this key to change the crosshair size (Some players prefer this instead of the new grenade reticle)

toggles.name: host_timescale
toggles.description:
Use this while practicing, if you miss a smoke you can accelerate time, for example:
1 = Normal time
0.5 = Half time (slow motion)
5 = 5x normal time (A smoke would last 4 seconds)
